attributes.action: provide more funding to aid in getting better treatment for people with Intestinal Failure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present there are only two units in the country that provide care for people with Intestinal Failure one at St Mark's Hospital
Northwick Park
Watford Road
Harrow
Middlesex 

the other 

Salford Royal NHS FoundationTrust
Stott Lane
Salford
Manchester 
at present my partner had been waiting for nearly 4 months as an inpatient at Rochdale Infirmary for treatment from the unit in Manchester but there are also 16 patients waiting admission. I think this situation is totally unaceptable and think something needs to be done about it to provide more facilities to enable people to get the treatment that they so desperately need. 

For more information please see this Facebook Group Get Jason Mulligan to Hope Hospital.

Please consider helping me on this matter.

Thank you
